channel.title: Fangz for nothing - industry city sleepers [Dub/Brostep, DnB]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/fangz-for-nothing
SOOOO, this actually is what was born out of the "What's your least favorite sound" thread. You lot inspired me to jam as many of the sounds people were naming in one track that I could. Here's the full list of the sounds I used, in order:
Charge Mold Subway Bumble Scarf (I might or might not have used this pattern??) Castle Marble Freak Scarf Sweeper
All non-AP sounds.
Fun fact: This was going to be my submission for the second Auxy tournament that's going on now but decided against it.
Guess that's about it I'll stop blabbering now :smiley:

item.title: Fangz for nothing - industry city sleepers [Dub/Brostep, DnB]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/fangz-for-nothing

SOOOO, this actually is what was born out of the “What’s your least favorite sound” thread. You lot inspired me to jam as many of the sounds people were naming in one track that I could. Here’s the full list of the sounds I used, in order:

Charge
Mold
Subway
Bumble
Scarf (I might or might not have used this pattern??)
Castle
Marble
Freak
Scarf
Sweeper

All non-AP sounds.

Fun fact: This was going to be my submission for the second Auxy tournament that’s going on now but decided against it.

Guess that’s about it I’ll stop blabbering now
